name: Bankin'Bacon
description:
Authors:

  • Ariel Coppes (@arielsan)
  • Enzo Gaiero (@playorbust)
  • Rubén Garat (@rgarat)
  • Anthony García (@thonyg09)

In a fight where your life is currency...

You gotta play oinkredibly frugally.

Grunt your way into becoming the top hog.

Players: 2 to 4
Controls: Gamepad (Tested with Xbox 360 controllers)

Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Aim
Left Shoulder: Dash
Right Shoulder: Fire

Press key 2, 3 or 4 to start the game with those number of players or press start with the gamepads.

UPDATE: We added basic keyboard support

Player 1
WASD: Move
Z: Fire
X: Dash

Player 2
Arrow keys: Move
O: Fire
P: Dash
